content.value:
People really don't know how disrespectful it is to speak in jargon. My doctor does it. My lawyer does it. 

I have to check them every time. 

To commit to your industry's vocabulary over the responsibility of communication is dangerous and arresting to your clients.
content.html: People really don't know how disrespectful it is to speak in jargon. My doctor does it. My lawyer does it. I have to check them every time. To commit to your industry's vocabulary over the responsibility of communication is dangerous and arresting to your clients.
